Ability.Name: Crusader Strike
Ability.Lua: if UnitPower("player", 9) < 3 then return true end

Ability.Name: Judgement
Ability.Lua:
sSoR = UnitBuffID("player", 20154) sSoT = UnitBuffID("player", 31801) sSoJ = UnitBuffID("player", 20164) sSoI = UnitBuffID("player", 20165)
if sSoR ~= nil or sSoT ~= nil or sSoJ ~= nil or sSoI ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Divine Storm
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Hammer of Wrath
Ability.Lua:
local sAW = UnitBuffID("player", 31884) local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if sAW ~= nil then return true else if unithealth <= 20 then return true end end

Ability.Name: Templar's Verdict
Ability.Lua:
local sDivinePurpose = UnitBuffID("player", 90174)
if UnitPower("player", 9) == 3 or sDivinePurpose ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Crusader Aura
Ability.Lua:
local Aura = GetShapeshiftForm("player")
if Aura ~= 5 and IsMounted() then return true end

Ability.Name: Inquisition
Ability.Lua:
local sDivinePurpose = UnitBuffID("player", 90174) local inqBuff, _, _, _, _, _, inqExpireTime = UnitBuffID("player", 84963)
if inqBuff ~= nil then local inqExpire = (inqExpireTime - GetTime()) if inqExpire < 4 then if UnitPower("player", 9) == 3 or sDivinePurpose ~= nil then return true end end else if UnitPower("player", 9) == 3 or sDivinePurpose ~= nil then return true end end

Ability.Name: Consecration
Ability.Lua:
local manapercent = 100 * UnitPower("player") / UnitPowerMax("player")
if manapercent > 70 then return true end

Ability.Name: Exorcism if Art of War
Ability.Lua:
sAoW = UnitBuffID("player", 59578)
if sAoW ~= nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Exorcism
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Seal of Anything
Ability.Lua:
sSoR = UnitBuffID("player", 20154) sSoT = UnitBuffID("player", 31801) sSoJ = UnitBuffID("player", 20164) sSoI = UnitBuffID("player", 20165)
if sSoR ~= nil or sSoT ~= nil or sSoJ ~= nil or sSoI ~= nil then --We have a seal up else return true end

Ability.Name: Shield of the Righteous
Ability.Lua: if UnitPower("player", 9) == 3 then return true end

Ability.Name: Avenger's Shield
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Hammer of the Righteous
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Zealotry
Ability.Lua:
local sDivinePurpose = UnitBuffID("player", 90174) local sAW = UnitBuffID("player", 31884)
if UnitPower("player", 9) < 2 or sDivinePurpose ~= nil or sAW ~=nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Exorcism no other GCD
Ability.Lua:
--WORK IN PROGRESS. --Only cast if no other ability is coming off CD within 1.5 seconds and Holy Power ~= 3.
local CSstart, CSduration, CSenabled = GetSpellCooldown(35395); local CScooldown = (CSstart + CSduration - GetTime()) local JUstart, JUduration, JUenabled = GetSpellCooldown(20271); local JUcooldown = (JUstart + JUduration - GetTime())
if CScooldown <= 1.5 and JUcooldown <= 1.5 and UnitPower("player", 9) ~= 3 then return true end

Ability.Name: Word of Glory
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player")
if unithealth < 50 and UnitPower("player", 9) == 3 then return true end

Ability.Name: Flash of Light < 25% HP
Ability.Lua:
local sAW = UnitBuffID("player", 31884) local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target")
if sAW ~= nil then return true else if unithealth <= 20 then return true end end

Ability.Name: Word of Glory < 60%
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player")
if unithealth < 60 and UnitPower("player", 9) == 3 then return true end

Ability.Name: Holy Shield

local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player")
if unithealth < 40 and UnitPower("player", 9) ~= 3 then return true end

Ability.Name: Word of Glory < 100%

local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player")

Ability.Name: Avenging Wrath
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Rebuke
Ability.Lua: if IsShiftKeyDown() then return true end

Ability.Name: Lay on Hands < %20
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Lay on Hands < %15
Ability.Lua:
local unithealth = 100 * UnitHealth("player") / UnitHealthMax("player")
if unithealth <= 15 and GetSpellCooldown("Lay on Hands")==0 then return true end

Ability.Name: GoAK
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Hammer of Justice MO
Ability.Lua: if IsLeftAltKeyDown() then if UnitIsEnemy("player", "mouseover") then return true end end

Ability.Name: Pause
Ability.Lua: if IsShiftKeyDown() then StopAttack() return true end

Ability.Name: AOE/Single Target Switch
Ability.Lua: if modkeytime == nil then modkeytime = 0 end if IsLeftControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - modkeytime > 1 then modkeytime = GetTime() if modkeystate then modkeystate = nil print("Rotation mode: \124cFFDBFA2ASingle target") else modkeystate = 1 print("Rotation mode: \124cFFFA652AArea of Effect") end end

Ability.Name: Divine Storm (w/AOE switch)
Ability.Lua: if modkeystate then return true end

Ability.Name: Retribution Aura
Ability.Lua:
local Aura = GetShapeshiftForm("player")
if Aura ~= 2 and IsMounted() == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Seal of Righteousness (If AOE)
Ability.Lua:
sSoR = UnitBuffID("player", 20154)
if modkeystate and sSoR == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Crusader Strike (w/AOE switch)
Ability.Lua:
if modkeystate then return false end
if UnitPower("player", 9) < 3 then return true end

Ability.Name: WoW7th
Ability.Lua:
W7A = UnitBuffID("player", 100951)
if W7A == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Seal of Truth (If Not AOE)
Ability.Lua:
sSoT = UnitBuffID("player", 31801)
if modkeystate then return false end
if sSoT == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Dont' Dismount
Ability.Lua: if IsMounted() then return true end

Ability.Name: --Offensive Spells--
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 97417, 97977 } local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy", "Twisted Spirit", "Amani´shi Hatcher", "Crystal Prison", "Hakkar's Chains", "Exposed Head of Magmaw", "Battleground Demolisher", "Ozumat", "Right Foot", "Left Foot" } local noaggromobs = nil local immunity = nil
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID("target",v) then immunity = 1 end end
for i,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName("target") == v then noaggromobs = 1 end end
if UnitIsDead("target") or immunity or UnitCanAttack("player","target") == nil or (UnitAffectingCombat("target") == nil and noaggromobs == nil and UnitIsPlayer("target") == nil) or tonumber(UnitGUID("target"):sub(5,5),16) == 4 then return true end
